Variant Name: Verona - 36 inch Ultima Collection Freestanding Gas Range with 5 Sealed SABAF Brass Burners, 5 cu. ft. Oven Capacity, Temperature Gauge (Burgundy) - VUFSGG365BU
Variant HTML:
An angled stainless-steel handle and analogue temperature gauge are just two examples of the elegant details found on this 36" Verona gas range from the Ultima Collection. The cooktop has 5 sealed SABAF brass burners that produce a combined 57,000 BTU, and the 5-cu. ft. oven has a convection fan to ensure even heating.

Dishwasher Functions:

  • 5 SABAF Brass Burners with a Sealed Cap
  • Total BTU: 57,000
  • Two-Ring, 5,000 to 12,000 BTU
  • Double-Sided Semi-Rapid 1,500 to 8,000 BTU
  • In a dual-burner system, the three crowns provide 1,100–17,000 BTU, 1,100–2,800 BTU, and 5,000–14,200 BTU of heat.
  • Ignition System with One-Touch Safety Shut-Off Thermocouple
  • Resilient Cast Iron Grates in Place
  • Wok Support Ring—Cast Iron


Kitchen Appliances:

  • Storage capacity: 5.0 cubic feet (30" width x 16" depth x 15.5" height).
  • 20k BTU Power Range for Ovens
  • Full-Width Broiler Element with Closed Door
  • Broiler Power of 15,000 BTU
  • The use of a fan motor to achieve convection
  • Features (Broil, Defrost, Bake, Convection Bake, and Fan Assist)
  • Three-Pane Removable Glass Oven Door with Soft-Close Mechanism
  • Four Light-Emitting Diode Oven Spotlights
  • Interior catalytic panels and easy-to-clean enamel
  • 2 - adjustable standard rack
  • 2 - maintain a stationary position while gliding
  • one (1) air fry pan
  • one - assembly of the broiler pan


Extra Functions:

  • Timers for the Bell
  • Round, Comfortable Control Knobs in Chrome
  • Comes with an LP Conversion Kit
  • Power supply: 120 volts, 60 Hz, 15 amps
  • 2 years of coverage for parts and labor


Freight Charges May Apply

Features

  • Wide-Bottom Drawer for Organizing
    • Helps maintain a neat and orderly kitchen by providing a place to store cookware.
  • Precision Analog Thermometer
    • Includes a traditional analog thermometer
  • Delicate, spherical knobs
    • Features rounded, easy-to-touch knobs
  • Steel Handle with an Angle
    • The ergonomic and aesthetically pleasing angled stainless steel handle is a win-win.
  • Air-Cooled Fan
    • Cooking is done evenly with the help of a convection oven fan.
  • Sabaf Fire Pits
    • Designed with heat distribution, fire power, rapid ignition, and safety in mind, these burners are manufactured by SABAF.
  • Oven Capacity: 5 Cu. Ft.
    • You can bake, roast, or broil large meals in the roomy oven.
  • Every Brass Burner
    • Brass burners, which are both efficient and long-lasting, offer better heat distribution and reliability.
  • Continuous Grates Made of Cast Iron
    • Pots and pans are easily moved thanks to the heavy-duty continuous grates.

Variant Name: Verona - 36 inch Ultima Collection Freestanding Gas Range with 5 Sealed SABAF Brass Burners, 5 cu. ft. Oven Capacity, Temperature Gauge (Matte Black) - VUFSGG365E
Variant HTML:
Elegant details like an angled stainless-steel handle and analogue temperature gauge adorn the 36" Verona Ultima Collection Gas Range, which brings style and functionality to your kitchen. The cooktop features 5 sealed SABAF brass burners with a combined output of 57,000 BTU, and the 5-cu. ft. oven is equipped with a convection fan to ensure even heat distribution.

Dishwasher Features:

  • 5 SABAF Brass Burners with a Sealed Cap
  • Total BTU: 57,000
  • Two 5,000 to 12,000 BTU double-ring units
  • Two 1,500 to 8,000 BTU semi-rapid heaters
  • Two-Burner Setup: 1,100–17,000 BTU for the Double Crown, 1,100–2,800 BTU for the Inner Crown, and 5,000–14,200 BTU for the Outer Crown
  • System for Ignition with One Touch and Instant Safety Shut-Off Thermocouple
  • Grates made of continuous cast iron
  • Wok Support Ring—Cast Iron


Kitchen Appliances:

  • 30"W x 16"D x 15.5 H cu. ft.
  • Power of the Oven: 21,000 BTU
  • Element for Broiler - Complete Width, Door Closed
  • Powerful Broiler with 15,000 BTU
  • Using a Fan Motor for Convection
  • Baking, Convection Baking, Broiling, Defrosting, and Fan Assist are functionalities.
  • Easy-Close with Three-Pane Detachable Glass Door for Ovens
  • Introducing our 4-light LED oven reflector set!
  • Interior catalytic panels and easy-to-clean enamel
  • 2-regular rack with adjustable positions
  • 2-rest on glides while in a stationary position
  • one air fry pan
  • one - assembly of the broiler pan


Further Characteristics:

  • Temporary Ring
  • Control Knobs—Round and Soft-Touch Chrome
  • Comes with an LP Conversion Kit
  • Power supply: 120 volts, 60 Hz, 15 amps
  • policy-compliant parts and labor for two years

Variant Name: Verona - 36 inch Ultima Collection Freestanding Gas Range with 5 Sealed SABAF Brass Burners, 5 cu. ft. Oven Capacity, Temperature Gauge (White) - VUFSGG365W
Variant HTML:
An angled stainless-steel handle and analogue temperature gauge are just two examples of the elegant details found on this 36" Verona gas range from the Ultima Collection. The cooktop has 5 sealed SABAF brass burners that produce a combined 57,000 BTU, and the 5-cu. ft. oven has a convection fan to ensure even heating.

Kitchen Appliances:

  • 5 Protected SABAF Brass Fire Pits
  • 57,000 BTU Total
  • Two-Ring Double-Stage Heater—5,000 to 12,000 BTU
  • Two 1,500 to 8,000 BTU semi-rapid heaters
  • Burner Setup: 1,100–17,000 BTU Double Crown, 1,100–2,800 BTU Inner Crown, 5,000–14,200 BTU Outer Crown
  • System for Ignition with One Touch and Instant Safety Shut-Off Thermocouple
  • Continuous Grates Made of Cast Iron
  • Support Ring for Cast-Iron Woks


Features of the Oven:

  • 5.0 cu. ft. / 30"W x 16"D x 15.5 cm H
  • Oven Power: 21,000 BTU
  • Broiler Part - Entire Width, With Door Closed
  • 15,000 BTU Power for the Broiler
  • Using a Fan Motor for Convection
  • Baking, Convection Baking, Broiling, Defrosting, and Fan Assist are functionalities.
  • Three-Pane Removable Glass Oven Door with Soft-Close Mechanism
  • 4-Lights for the Oven that Use LEDs
  • Catalytic panels inside + Easy-clean enamel exterior
  • 2-regular rack with adjustable positions
  • 2 - maintain a stationary position while gliding
  • 1-tray for air-frying
  • one - assembly of the broiler pan


Further Characteristics:

  • Timer for the Bell
  • Round, Comfortable Control Knobs in Chrome
  • Includes LP Conversion Kit
  • Power supply: 120 volts, 60 Hz, 15 amps
  • 2 years of coverage for parts and labor
